name: Online Tutoring
description: Online tutoring is a internet base teaching. Where I will teach by using Zoom or Google meet conferencing service. This is more handy we can meet from any where from the world.

name: One o One Home Tutoring
description: One o One home tutoring is a home base teaching process. Where I will go to your home and teach you directly. This is most efficient if you are base on Dhaka city only.

name: Offline Batch Tutoring
description: Offline batch tutoring is a common teaching process. Where you can  make some friends you can also share your knowledge with othrs and more fun while learning.
